Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Flashback Labs is building a Federated Learning Network that lets users privately and decentrally train AI models using their photo & video memories on their phone using Flashback Mobile App. 

All data stays on-phone or in the user’s own  bucket, protected by full access control and explicit consent. 

Using Federated Learning, users contribute to AI training without exposing raw data. Each user trains privately inside a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) and isolates sensitive data and computations from the rest of the system. 

Training sessions and rewards are transparently upon the validators validate the training.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data is stored on Filecoin’s decentralized network to support federated learning, ensuring that training datasets remain distributed, secure, and readily accessible for collaborative model training
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Data will be prepared using Singularity
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin: This data is confidential and cannot be shared.
